00219 
00220 #define VERT_MARK   1
00221 
00222 #define EDGE_ORIG   1
00223 #define EDGE_MARK   2
00224 
00225 #define FACE_MARK   1
00226 #define FACE_NEW    2
00227 
00228 void bmo_create_grid_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00229 {
00230     BMOperator bmop, prevop;
00231     BMVert *eve, *preveve;
00232     BMEdge *e;
00233     float vec[3], mat[4][4], phi, phid, dia = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "size");
00234     int a, tot = BMO_slot_int_get(op, "xsegments"), seg = BMO_slot_int_get(op, "ysegments");
00235 
00236     if (tot < 2) tot = 2;
00237     if (seg < 2) seg = 2;
00238 
00239     BMO_slot_mat4_get(op, "mat", mat);
00240 
00241     /* one segment first: the X axis */
00242     phi = 1.0f;
00243     phid = 2.0f / ((float)tot - 1);
00244     for (a = 0; a < tot; a++) {
00245         vec[0] = dia * phi;
00246         vec[1] = -dia;
00247         vec[2] = 0.0f;
00248         mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00249 
00250         eve = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00251         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, eve, VERT_MARK);
00252 
00253         if (a != 0) {
00254             e = BM_edge_create(bm, preveve, eve, NULL, TRUE);
00255             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EDGE_ORIG);
00256         }
00257 
00258         preveve = eve;
00259         phi -= phid;
00260     }
00261 
00262     /* extrude and translate */
00263     vec[0] = vec[2] = 0.0f;
00264     vec[1] = dia * phid;
00265     mul_mat3_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00266 
00267     for (a = 0; a < seg - 1; a++) {
00268         if (a) {
00269             BMO_op_initf(bm, &bmop, "extrude_edge_only edges=%s", &prevop, "geomout");
00270             BMO_op_exec(bm, &bmop);
00271             BMO_op_finish(bm, &prevop);
00272 
00273             BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, &bmop, "geomout", BM_VERT, VERT_MARK);
00274         }
00275         else {
00276             BMO_op_initf(bm, &bmop, "extrude_edge_only edges=%fe", EDGE_ORIG);
00277             BMO_op_exec(bm, &bmop);
00278             BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, &bmop, "geomout", BM_VERT, VERT_MARK);
00279         }
00280 
00281         BMO_op_callf(bm, "translate vec=%v verts=%s", vec, &bmop, "geomout");
00282         prevop = bmop;
00283     }
00284 
00285     if (a)
00286         BMO_op_finish(bm, &bmop);
00287 
00288     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "vertout", BM_VERT, VERT_MARK);
00289 }
00290 
00291 void bmo_create_uvsphere_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00292 {
00293     BMOperator bmop, prevop;
00294     BMVert *eve, *preveve;
00295     BMEdge *e;
00296     BMIter iter;
00297     float vec[3], mat[4][4], cmat[3][3], phi, q[4];
00298     float phid, dia = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "diameter");
00299     int a, seg = BMO_slot_int_get(op, "segments"), tot = BMO_slot_int_get(op, "revolutions");
00300 
00301     BMO_slot_mat4_get(op, "mat", mat);
00302 
00303     phid = 2.0f * (float)M_PI / tot;
00304     /* phi = 0.25f * (float)M_PI; */ /* UNUSED */
00305 
00306     /* one segment first */
00307     phi = 0;
00308     phid /= 2;
00309     for (a = 0; a <= tot; a++) {
00310         /* Going in this direction, then edge extruding, makes normals face outward */
00311         vec[0] = -dia * sinf(phi);
00312         vec[1] = 0.0;
00313         vec[2] = dia * cosf(phi);
00314         eve = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00315         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, eve, VERT_MARK);
00316 
00317         if (a != 0) {
00318             e = BM_edge_create(bm, preveve, eve, NULL, FALSE);
00319             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EDGE_ORIG);
00320         }
00321 
00322         phi += phid;
00323         preveve = eve;
00324     }
00325 
00326     /* extrude and rotate; negative phi to make normals face outward */
00327     phi = -M_PI / seg;
00328     q[0] = cosf(phi);
00329     q[3] = sinf(phi);
00330     q[1] = q[2] = 0.0f;
00331     quat_to_mat3(cmat, q);
00332 
00333     for (a = 0; a < seg; a++) {
00334         if (a) {
00335             BMO_op_initf(bm, &bmop, "extrude_edge_only edges=%s", &prevop, "geomout");
00336             BMO_op_exec(bm, &bmop);
00337             BMO_op_finish(bm, &prevop);
00338         }
00339         else {
00340             BMO_op_initf(bm, &bmop, "extrude_edge_only edges=%fe", EDGE_ORIG);
00341             BMO_op_exec(bm, &bmop);
00342         }
00343 
00344         BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, &bmop, "geomout", BM_VERT, VERT_MARK);
00345         BMO_op_callf(bm, "rotate cent=%v mat=%m3 verts=%s", vec, cmat, &bmop, "geomout");
00346         
00347         prevop = bmop;
00348     }
00349 
00350     if (a)
00351         BMO_op_finish(bm, &bmop);
00352 
00353     {
00354         float len, len2, vec2[3];
00355 
00356         len = 2 * dia * sinf(phid / 2.0f);
00357 
00358         /* length of one segment in shortest parallen */
00359         vec[0] = dia * sinf(phid);
00360         vec[1] = 0.0f;
00361         vec[2] = dia * cosf(phid);
00362 
00363         mul_v3_m3v3(vec2, cmat, vec);
00364         len2 = len_v3v3(vec, vec2);
00365 
00366         /* use shortest segment length divided by 3 as merge threshold */
00367         BMO_op_callf(bm, "removedoubles verts=%fv dist=%f", VERT_MARK, MIN2(len, len2) / 3.0f);
00368     }
00369 
00370     /* and now do imat */
00371     BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00372         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, eve, VERT_MARK)) {
00373             mul_m4_v3(mat, eve->co);
00374         }
00375     }
00376 
00377     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "vertout", BM_VERT, VERT_MARK);
00378 }
00379 
00380 void bmo_create_icosphere_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00381 {
00382     BMVert *eva[12];
00383     BMVert *v;
00384     BMIter liter;
00385     BMIter viter;
00386     BMLoop *l;
00387     float vec[3], mat[4][4] /* , phi, phid */;
00388     float dia = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "diameter");
00389     int a, subdiv = BMO_slot_int_get(op, "subdivisions");
00390 
00391     BMO_slot_mat4_get(op, "mat", mat);
00392 
00393     /* phid = 2.0f * (float)M_PI / subdiv; */ /* UNUSED */
00394     /* phi = 0.25f * (float)M_PI; */         /* UNUSED */
00395 
00396     dia /= 200.0f;
00397     for (a = 0; a < 12; a++) {
00398         vec[0] = dia * icovert[a][0];
00399         vec[1] = dia * icovert[a][1];
00400         vec[2] = dia * icovert[a][2];
00401         eva[a] = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00402 
00403         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, eva[a], VERT_MARK);
00404     }
00405 
00406     for (a = 0; a < 20; a++) {
00407         BMFace *eftemp;
00408         BMVert *v1, *v2, *v3;
00409 
00410         v1 = eva[icoface[a][0]];
00411         v2 = eva[icoface[a][1]];
00412         v3 = eva[icoface[a][2]];
00413 
00414         eftemp = BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, v1, v2, v3, NULL, NULL, FALSE);
00415         
00416         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, eftemp, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00417             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, l->e, EDGE_MARK);
00418         }
00419 
00420         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, eftemp, FACE_MARK);
00421     }
00422 
00423     dia *= 200.0f;
00424 
00425     if (subdiv > 1) {
00426         BMOperator bmop;
00427 
00428         BMO_op_initf(bm, &bmop,
00429                      "esubd edges=%fe "
00430                      "smooth=%f "
00431                      "numcuts=%i "
00432                      "use_gridfill=%b use_sphere=%b",
00433                      EDGE_MARK, dia, (1 << (subdiv-1)) - 1,
00434                      TRUE, TRUE);
00435 
00436         BMO_op_exec(bm, &bmop);
00437         BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, &bmop, "geomout", BM_VERT, VERT_MARK);
00438         BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, &bmop, "geomout", BM_EDGE, EDGE_MARK);
00439         BMO_op_finish(bm, &bmop);
00440     }
00441 
00442     /* must transform after because of sphere subdivision */
00443     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &viter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00444         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, VERT_MARK)) {
00445             mul_m4_v3(mat, v->co);
00446         }
00447     }
00448 
00449     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "vertout", BM_VERT, VERT_MARK);
00450 }
00451 
00452 void bmo_create_monkey_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00453 {
00454     BMVert *eve;
00455     BMVert **tv = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*tv) * monkeynv * 2, "tv");
00456     float mat[4][4];
00457     int i;
00458 
00459     BMO_slot_mat4_get(op, "mat", mat);
00460 
00461     for (i = 0; i < monkeynv; i++) {
00462         float v[3];
00463 
00464         v[0] = (monkeyv[i][0] + 127) / 128.0, v[1] = monkeyv[i][1] / 128.0, v[2] = monkeyv[i][2] / 128.0;
00465 
00466         tv[i] = BM_vert_create(bm, v, NULL);
00467         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, tv[i], VERT_MARK);
00468 
00469         tv[monkeynv + i] = (fabsf(v[0] = -v[0]) < 0.001f) ?
00470                     tv[i] :
00471                     (eve = BM_vert_create(bm, v, NULL), mul_m4_v3(mat, eve->co), eve);
00472 
00473         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, tv[monkeynv + i], VERT_MARK);
00474 
00475         mul_m4_v3(mat, tv[i]->co);
00476     }
00477 
00478     for (i = 0; i < monkeynf; i++) {
00479         BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm,
00480                                 tv[monkeyf[i][0] + i - monkeyo],
00481                                 tv[monkeyf[i][1] + i - monkeyo],
00482                                 tv[monkeyf[i][2] + i - monkeyo],
00483                                 (monkeyf[i][3] != monkeyf[i][2]) ? tv[monkeyf[i][3] + i - monkeyo] : NULL,
00484                                 NULL, FALSE);
00485 
00486         BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm,
00487                                 tv[monkeynv + monkeyf[i][2] + i - monkeyo],
00488                                 tv[monkeynv + monkeyf[i][1] + i - monkeyo],
00489                                 tv[monkeynv + monkeyf[i][0] + i - monkeyo],
00490                                 (monkeyf[i][3] != monkeyf[i][2]) ? tv[monkeynv + monkeyf[i][3] + i - monkeyo]: NULL,
00491                                 NULL, FALSE);
00492     }
00493 
00494     MEM_freeN(tv);
00495 
00496     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "vertout", BM_VERT, VERT_MARK);
00497 }
00498 
00499 
00500 void bmo_create_circle_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00501 {
00502     BMVert *v1, *lastv1 = NULL, *cent1, *firstv1 = NULL;
00503     float vec[3], mat[4][4], phi, phid;
00504     float dia = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "diameter");
00505     int segs = BMO_slot_int_get(op, "segments");
00506     int cap_ends = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "cap_ends");
00507     int cap_tris = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "cap_tris");
00508     int a;
00509     
00510     if (!segs)
00511         return;
00512     
00513     BMO_slot_mat4_get(op, "mat", mat);
00514 
00515     phid = 2.0f * (float)M_PI / segs;
00516     phi = 0;
00517 
00518     if (cap_ends) {
00519         vec[0] = vec[1] = 0.0f;
00520         vec[2] = 0.0;
00521         mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00522         
00523         cent1 = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00524     }
00525 
00526     for (a = 0; a < segs; a++, phi += phid) {
00527         /* Going this way ends up with normal(s) upward */
00528         vec[0] = -dia * sinf(phi);
00529         vec[1] = dia * cosf(phi);
00530         vec[2] = 0.0f;
00531         mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00532         v1 = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00533 
00534         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v1, VERT_MARK);
00535         
00536         if (lastv1)
00537             BM_edge_create(bm, v1, lastv1, NULL, FALSE);
00538         
00539         if (a && cap_ends) {
00540             BMFace *f;
00541             
00542             f = BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, cent1, lastv1, v1, NULL, NULL, FALSE);
00543             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, FACE_NEW);
00544         }
00545         
00546         if (!firstv1)
00547             firstv1 = v1;
00548 
00549         lastv1 = v1;
00550     }
00551 
00552     if (!a)
00553         return;
00554 
00555     BM_edge_create(bm, lastv1, firstv1, NULL, FALSE);
00556 
00557     if (cap_ends) {
00558         BMFace *f;
00559         
00560         f = BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, cent1, v1, firstv1, NULL, NULL, FALSE);
00561         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, FACE_NEW);
00562     }
00563     
00564     if (!cap_tris) {
00565         BMO_op_callf(bm, "dissolve_faces faces=%ff", FACE_NEW);
00566     }
00567     
00568     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "vertout", BM_VERT, VERT_MARK);
00569 }
00570 
00571 void bmo_create_cone_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00572 {
00573     BMVert *v1, *v2, *lastv1 = NULL, *lastv2 = NULL, *cent1, *cent2, *firstv1, *firstv2;
00574     float vec[3], mat[4][4], phi, phid;
00575     float dia1 = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "diameter1");
00576     float dia2 = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "diameter2");
00577     float depth = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "depth");
00578     int segs = BMO_slot_int_get(op, "segments");
00579     int cap_ends = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "cap_ends");
00580     int cap_tris = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "cap_tris");
00581     int a;
00582     
00583     if (!segs)
00584         return;
00585     
00586     BMO_slot_mat4_get(op, "mat", mat);
00587 
00588     phid = 2.0f * (float)M_PI / segs;
00589     phi = 0;
00590 
00591     depth *= 0.5f;
00592     if (cap_ends) {
00593         vec[0] = vec[1] = 0.0f;
00594         vec[2] = -depth;
00595         mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00596         
00597         cent1 = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00598 
00599         vec[0] = vec[1] = 0.0f;
00600         vec[2] = depth;
00601         mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00602         
00603         cent2 = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00604 
00605         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, cent1, VERT_MARK);
00606         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, cent2, VERT_MARK);
00607     }
00608 
00609     for (a = 0; a < segs; a++, phi += phid) {
00610         vec[0] = dia1 * sinf(phi);
00611         vec[1] = dia1 * cosf(phi);
00612         vec[2] = -depth;
00613         mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00614         v1 = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00615 
00616         vec[0] = dia2 * sinf(phi);
00617         vec[1] = dia2 * cosf(phi);
00618         vec[2] = depth;
00619         mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00620         v2 = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00621 
00622         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v1, VERT_MARK);
00623         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v2, VERT_MARK);
00624 
00625         if (a) {
00626             if (cap_ends) {
00627                 BMFace *f;
00628                 
00629                 f = BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, cent1, lastv1, v1, NULL, NULL, FALSE);
00630                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, FACE_NEW);
00631                 f = BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, cent2, v2, lastv2, NULL, NULL, FALSE);
00632                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, FACE_NEW);
00633             }
00634             BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, lastv1, lastv2, v2, v1, NULL, FALSE);
00635         }
00636         else {
00637             firstv1 = v1;
00638             firstv2 = v2;
00639         }
00640 
00641         lastv1 = v1;
00642         lastv2 = v2;
00643     }
00644 
00645     if (!a)
00646         return;
00647 
00648     if (cap_ends) {
00649         BMFace *f;
00650         
00651         f = BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, cent1, v1, firstv1, NULL, NULL, FALSE);
00652         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, FACE_NEW);
00653         f = BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, cent2, firstv2, v2, NULL, NULL, FALSE);
00654         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, FACE_NEW);
00655     }
00656     
00657     if (!cap_tris) {
00658         BMO_op_callf(bm, "dissolve_faces faces=%ff", FACE_NEW);
00659     }
00660     
00661     BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, v1, v2, firstv2, firstv1, NULL, FALSE);
00662 
00663     BMO_op_callf(bm, "removedoubles verts=%fv dist=%f", VERT_MARK, 0.000001);
00664     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "vertout", BM_VERT, VERT_MARK);
00665 }
00666 
00667 void bmo_create_cube_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00668 {
00669     BMVert *v1, *v2, *v3, *v4, *v5, *v6, *v7, *v8;
00670     float vec[3], mat[4][4], off = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "size") / 2.0f;
00671 
00672     BMO_slot_mat4_get(op, "mat", mat);
00673 
00674     if (!off) off = 0.5f;
00675 
00676     vec[0] = -off;
00677     vec[1] = -off;
00678     vec[2] = -off;
00679     mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00680     v1 = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00681     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v1, VERT_MARK);
00682 
00683     vec[0] = -off;
00684     vec[1] = off;
00685     vec[2] = -off;
00686     mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00687     v2 = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00688     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v2, VERT_MARK);
00689 
00690     vec[0] = off;
00691     vec[1] = off;
00692     vec[2] = -off;
00693     mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00694     v3 = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00695     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v3, VERT_MARK);
00696 
00697     vec[0] = off;
00698     vec[1] = -off;
00699     vec[2] = -off;
00700     mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00701     v4 = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00702     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v4, VERT_MARK);
00703 
00704     vec[0] = -off;
00705     vec[1] = -off;
00706     vec[2] = off;
00707     mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00708     v5 = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00709     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v5, VERT_MARK);
00710 
00711     vec[0] = -off;
00712     vec[1] = off;
00713     vec[2] = off;
00714     mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00715     v6 = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00716     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v6, VERT_MARK);
00717 
00718     vec[0] = off;
00719     vec[1] = off;
00720     vec[2] = off;
00721     mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00722     v7 = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00723     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v7, VERT_MARK);
00724 
00725     vec[0] = off;
00726     vec[1] = -off;
00727     vec[2] = off;
00728     mul_m4_v3(mat, vec);
00729     v8 = BM_vert_create(bm, vec, NULL);
00730     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v8, VERT_MARK);
00731 
00732     /* the four sides */
00733     BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, v5, v6, v2, v1, NULL, FALSE);
00734     BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, v6, v7, v3, v2, NULL, FALSE);
00735     BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, v7, v8, v4, v3, NULL, FALSE);
00736     BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, v8, v5, v1, v4, NULL, FALSE);
00737     
00738     /* top/bottom */
00739     BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, v1, v2, v3, v4, NULL, FALSE);
00740     BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, v8, v7, v6, v5, NULL, FALSE);
00741 
00742     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "vertout", BM_VERT, VERT_MARK);
00743 }
